DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of coenzyme Q10 administration in improving mitochondrial function as measured by anaerobic threshold in older athletes on a stable dose of statin medication.
DOC.brief_title: Coenzyme Q10 in Older Athletes Treated With Statin Medications
